alert.note: Alert for Val Verde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 11:07AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Val Verde County through 1145 AM CDT... At 1107 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northeast of Comstock. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Loma Alta, Bakers Crossing, Vinegarone and Devils River State Nat Area Del Norte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
